Job Title:.NET Software Developer
Company: Escobar-Dixon

Job Description:
We are seeking a talented.NET Software Developer to join our team of skilled professionals. As a valued member of our team, she will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining our software applications. The ideal candidate will be a nurturing and collaborative individual with excellent communication skills.

Responsibilities:

 Design and develop high-quality software applications using.NET technology
 Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure timely delivery of projects
 Handle customer inquiries and provide excellent customer service

Qualifications and Experience:

 3+ years of experience in.NET software development
 Strong understanding of object-oriented programming and software design patterns
 Excellent communication and collaboration skills
 Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced environment

Perks and Benefits:
We offer a competitive salary ranging from $80,000 to $110,000 USD per year, based on experience and skills. Our comprehensive benefits package includes medical, dental, and vision insurance, as well as a 401(k) matching program.

About Us:
Escobar-Dixon is a leading software development company committed to delivering innovative solutions to our clients. We value diversity and inclusion in the workplace and are an equal opportunities employer.
